quotes.quote: The best way to avoid a hangover is to stay drunk.
A hangover is the wrath of grapes.
The hangover became a part of the day as well allowed-for as the Spanish siesta.
If a man sits down to think, he is immediately asked if he has a headache.

Sometimes when you get hammered till the small hours you feel pretty good in the morning, but really it's just because you're still a bit drunk. That old hangover is just toying with you, working out when to bite.
There are two kinds of hangover: in one you feel ill and incapable, in the other you feel ill and lucid.
Talking to a drunk person was like talking to an extremely happy, severely brain-damaged three-year-old.
If any suffering was fruitless it was the agony of a hangover; what he suffered now could not expiate suffering of any other kind.
If the headache would only precede the intoxication, alcoholism would be a virtue.
Might let him take it home and slaughter that he got friends for all of my friends they ain't leaving 'till we say when and we gon' hangover the next day.
With a hangover and with fear, it is difficult to put a helmet on your head.
Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
The Hangover was lightening in a bottle. We're aware of that. It went through the roof all over the world.
Being hungover is like winning the lottery, only they pay you in regret.
The hangover was brutal but he didn't mind. It told him he had been somewhere else, some place good.
A real hangover is nothing to try out family remedies on. The only cure for a real hangover is death.
One of the curious effects of a bad hangover is that you think you're wrong whether you are or not. Not wrong in particulars, but wrong in general, wrong about everything.
A hangover is just your body reminding you that you're an idiot.
Theres nothing like taking two flights when you have a horrible hangover. Its bad when people can see actual alcohol seeping out of your disgusting pores.
Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
Happiness is, waking up without a hangover.
My head is pounding. Like the worst hangover ever.
If getting drunk was how people forgot they were mortal, then hangovers were how they remembered.
First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
Some people spend the day in complaining of a headache, and the night in drinking the wine that gives it.
Headaches are for sloths as hangovers for drunks.
For a bad hangover take the juice of two quarts of whisky.
Grease is the only cure for a hangover.
Unfortunately, the hangover may prove to be proportional to the binge.
You come home, and you party. But after that, you get a hangover. Everything about that is negative.
The plan was to drink until the pain is over, But what's worse, the pain or the hangover?
Hangover is when some of you is sober enough to realize how drunk the rest of you is.
Just as the quality and quantity of the spirits consumed may dictate the physical aspects of your hangover, the spirit in which you consumed the spirits will often decide the metaphysical.
Half a hangover merely wrecks the night before as well as the morning after.

Alcohol is a perennially fascinating topic of study for researchers in a variety of different fields. Its intoxicating effects on the mind have long been linked in popular culture with relativity and have been explored at length by by scholars of literature and the arts.
Alcohol is the most commonly abused drug.
Alcoholism is that burning desire like being addicted to nicotine.
Alcohol is made very tempting by the powerful advertising and media hype. These are tool used for recruiting novices and sustaining the habits in veterans.
Others also use alcohol/drugs to fill the emptiness they feel inside or to get 'high'.
Alcohol is what is served at most functions, weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, traditional festivities, sporting events.
Alcohol is a simple chemical, but its effects on the body are extraordinarily complex and highly individual.
The stronger a drink is--that is, the more alcohol it contains--the greater the amount of alcohol that will get into your bloodstream.
Alcohol is a legal drug and therefore afforded special status.
Alcohol isn't really a drug, the thinking goes, because it won't hurt you unless you overindulge.
The dictionary defines a hangover as 'the after effects of excessive indulgence in alcoholic drink.'
Alcohol can cause many types of accidents. It may also at times lead to violent behavior or contribute to the risk of suicide.
Alcohol is also a drug addiction - a fact which multiplies the significance of its inherently negative potential.
Alcohol is a stupid molecule which is clever in its ability to play mood music on complex brain systems, but it is an addictive drug with a far from innocent profile.
Alcohol is fun, the wine of the Eucharist, a profitable and taxable commodity, but a drug among drugs and highly ambiguous in its costs and benefits.
Among young people. Drinking is for getting drunk. And many go on to become alcoholics.
Drunkenness is not a new vice, Its ravages have always been a scourge on the human race.
Thousands are killed and injured every year by teenagers driving too fast or under the influence of drugs and drink.
Do not seek solace in alcohol. Alcohol obscures good judgement and leaves you unable to think clearly.
What began as an apparently harmless pastime has ended up as a frightening, overpowering addiction or obsession.
Not all chemicals are bad. Without chemicals such as hydrogen and oxygen, for example, there would be no way to make water, a vital ingredient for beer.
Without a question, the greatest invention in the history of mankind is beer. Oh, I grant you that the wheel was also a fine invention, but the wheel does not go nearly as well with pizza.
Man being reasonable must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
I think a man ought to get drunk at least twice a year, just on principle, so he won't let himself get snotty about it.
Always remember that I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
My rule of life prescribed as an absolutely sacred rite smoking cigars and also the drinking of alcohol before, after and, if need be, during all meals and in the intervals between them.
The water was not fit to drink. To make it palatable, we had to add whisky. By diligent effort, I learnt to like it.
Beverages that contain more congeners, such as whiskey, brandy and red wine are more likely to cause hangover symptoms.
Vitamin C can not only cure hangover, it can also sober up a dead drunk, an Australian doctor has found.
Come morning you are going to feel guilty about hanging one on.
Hangover is nothing more than the showing of a person's guilt complex for getting drunk in the first place.
If you feel so sick you're afraid you're going to die, you're suffering a pretty ordinary hangover.
A hangover is the wrath of grapes.
Research shown that beverages which contain pure alcohol such as gin or vodka, cause fewer hangover effects.
Two heads are better than one, unless you have a hangover.
No one gets a hangover from other people's drinking.
Drinking doesn't cause hangovers; stopping drinking causes hangovers.
Depression and hangovers really do go hand in hand.
I'll drink as long as I have a hangover and I'll have a hangover as long as I drink. It's a vicious circle.
I'll tell you the secret to avoid hangovers. Don't stop drinking.
If you act drunk long enough, you get a REAL hangover.
I didn't want to get dehydrated. That's what gives you a hangover.
A hangover slows a man down. Forces him to take stock. It begins like a lion and ends like a lullaby. Can't fight the hangover, old son. It's like growing old. Can't fight it.
If I stop drinking all at once, I'm afraid the cumulative hangover will kill me.
Alcoholic hangovers are much easier to cure. Emotional benders are the tough ones.
